title: SCP Series 5 - Audio Edition
content:
[[size larger]]Showcase for the best audio adaptations of articles on this wiki.[[/size]]

For speed and convenience this list is available here by itself, but you can also head over to the main [[[Audio Adaptations]]] hub to see all catalogued adaptations of SCP Series, tales, and more in one huge list.

----

[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Indie+Flower');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Dancing+Script|IM+Fell+DW+Pica+SC');

.news {
  font-family: 'IM Fell DW Pica SC', serif;
  color: #000000;
}

.lie{
    font-family: 'Courier', monospace;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin: 2px 1px 1px;
    background-color: #a3cef1;
    overflow-wrap: break-word;
}

.pigeon {
  font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
  color: #a40;
}

.taboo a{
    color: green;
    font-style: bold;
    font-weight: 800;
}

.pinkle {
color:#02861C;
background-color: #FBFBEF;
}

[[/module]]





[[module css]]
.section {
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #eee 0%, #eee 50%, #f7f7f7 50%, #f7f7f7 100%);
    border: 1px solid #888;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1em;}
.section > p {
    display: none;}
.section h3 {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    padding-left: 0.7em;
    margin-top: none;
    margin-bottom: none;
    font-size: 1.4em;
    font-weight: bolder;
    color: #901;}
.section > a {
    float: left;
    font-size: 1.4em;
    font-weight: bolder;
    padding-right: 0.7em;
    margin-top: 0.5em;}
.section table {
    width: 100%;}
.section table * {
    text-align: left;}
.section table td, .section table th {
    border: none;}
.section table *:first-child {
    text-align: left;}
.section table tr{
    background: #fff;
    border-bottom: 1px dashed #888;}
.section table tr:first-child {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #888;}
.section table tr:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;}
.section table tr:last-child{
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff 0%, #fff 50%, #f7f7f7 100%);
    margin-bottom: 1em;}
.section table td:last-child {
    width:33%;
    background-color:#f7f7f7;}
.section td:last-child a {
    white-space: nowrap;}
.section table td:last-child {
     width:33%;
     background-color:#f7f7f7;}

.section .image {
	width:4em;
	border-radius: 50%;
	pointer-events: none;
	float:right;
}

.proposal table td:first-child,
.proposal table th:first-child {
     width:33%;
     overflow-wrap: anywhere;
     text-align: right;
}

.scp table td:first-child{
      width:5.5em;
}

.toc-table {
    float: right;
    margin-left: 1rem;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tr,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table thead th,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tfoot th {
    border: none;
    border-right: dashed 1px #999;
    border-left: dashed 1px #999;
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tr {
    border:none;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td:first-of-type,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table {
    border-left:none;
}
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table tbody td:last-of-type,
.toc-table table.wiki-content-table{
    border-right:none;
}
[[/module]]
